content:
Pleased to inform that HL7 India is hosting the second virtual FHIR connectathon on December 10th to 12th. Request support from all community members to make this endeavor a success.

Tickets can be booked at : https://connectathon2021.in

CC : @Grahame Grieve @Lloyd McKenzie @Ren√© Spronk @David Hay @Josh Mandel @Rien Wertheim @Mirjam Baltus @Rob Hausam @John Moehrke @Nagesh Bashyam @Keith Boone @Hans Buitendijk @Sadhana Alangar @Peter Jordan
Look forward to contributing to the second FHIR connectathon by organised by HL7 India!

After the exciting and exhilarating experience in the First Connectathon 2020, looking forward to the second edition where we are hoping to raise the bar in the Terminology track with involvement of the Indian Curated Loinc Database in the hands on sessions.... Which hopefully will help us get ready for the actual deployment of the same...
